## isDate() function

Returns true if `input` is a Date object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isDate: <T>(input: T) => input is Extract<T, Date>
```



## Example


```ts
isDate(new Date()); // true
isDate("2024-01-01"); // false
```


[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/isDate.ts)
